Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
Pizza
public class Pizza extends Object
A Pizza class that allows for specifying the pizza size, crust type, and adding and removing toppings. Allows for duplicate toppings (even though some pizza shops do not allow for that) October 24, 2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Norm Krumpe

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Pizza(int luckyNumber)
    Constructs a random topping pizza with 0 to 5 random toppings, based on a lucky integer.
    Pizza(String size, String crust)
    Constructs a zero-topping, pizza with a specified size and crust type, for carry-out.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(String size, String crust)
      Constructs a zero-topping, pizza with a specified size and crust type, for carry-out.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of this pizza
      crust - the crust-type of this pizza
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the size or crust type is not valid

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(int luckyNumber)
      Constructs a random topping pizza with 0 to 5 random toppings, based on a lucky integer. The size and crust types will be random, and random (possibly duplicated) toppings will be added. Delivery or carry-out will be randomly selected. Every time the same lucky number is entered, the same pizza will result.
      Parameters:
      luckyNumber - a lucky number

    • setDelivery

      public void setDelivery(boolean delivery)
      Sets whether this pizza is to be delivered
      Parameters:
      delivery - true if this pizza is to be delivered, and false for carry-out

    • getDelivery

      public boolean getDelivery()
      Returns whether this pizza is to be delivered
      Returns:
      true if this pizza is to be delivered, and false for carry-out

    • hasTopping

      public boolean hasTopping(String topping)
      Returns whether this pizza contains the specified topping.
      Parameters:
      topping - the topping to be checked
      Returns:
      true if this pizza contains the specified topping, and false otherwise

    • addTopping

      public boolean addTopping(String topping)
      Adds the specified topping to this pizza if the topping is valid.
      Parameters:
      topping - the topping to be added
      Returns:
      true if the topping was successfully added, or false otherwise (if the topping is not on the list of available toppings)

      Gets the number of toppings on this pizza
